name: Create with Garfield!
overview: Create With Garfield is a 1986 educational video game developed and published by Ahead Designs. It was released for the Apple II, Commodore 64 and IBM PC. A deluxe edition was released in 1987. Create With Garfield is a simulation game. The player can choose a character or prop to display on the screen. They can also choose certain dialogue or even write their own, provided with either a thought bubble or a speech bubble. In the deluxe edition, the player has two disks and if the second disk is inserted, new character and prop sprites will appear. After the copyright screen, the player with encounter a "How to make a Cartoon" screen. It explains that the player must select a background, select a stick on, then save. The Player can save their comic onto a data disk.
